Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
Represents a flight in the booking system. Manages flight details, passenger list, and dynamic pricing.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Constructs a new Flight with the specified details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, double basePrice, int capacity)
      Constructs a new Flight with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier for the flight
      flightNumber - airline code and flight number
      origin - departure airport
      destination - arrival airport
      departureDate - date of departure
      basePrice - standard ticket price
      capacity - maximum number of passengers

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns:
      the flight's unique identifier

    • getFlightNumber

      public String getFlightNumber()
      Returns:
      the flight number

    • getOrigin

      public String getOrigin()
      Returns:
      the departure airport

    • getDestination

      public String getDestination()
      Returns:
      the arrival airport

    • getDepartureDate

      public LocalDate getDepartureDate()
      Returns:
      the departure date

    • getBasePrice

      public double getBasePrice()
      Returns:
      the standard ticket price

    • getCapacity

      public int getCapacity()
      Returns:
      the maximum passenger capacity

    • isDeleted

      public boolean isDeleted()
      Returns:
      true if the flight has been soft-deleted

    • setDeleted

      public void setDeleted(boolean deleted)
      Parameters:
      deleted - true to mark as deleted, false otherwise

    • calculatePrice

      public double calculatePrice(LocalDate bookingDate)
      Calculates the ticket price based on how far in advance the booking is made. - Within 7 days: 50% increase - Within 14 days: 25% increase - More than 14 days: base price
      Parameters:
      bookingDate - the date when the booking is being made
      Returns:
      the calculated ticket price

    • addPassenger

      public boolean addPassenger(Customer passenger)
      Adds a passenger to the flight if there is available capacity.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the customer to add as a passenger
      Returns:
      true if passenger was added successfully, false if flight is full

    • getPassengers

      public List<Customer> getPassengers()
      Returns:
      a defensive copy of the passenger list

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Returns a short summary of the flight details.
      Returns:
      a string containing basic flight information

    • getDetailsLong

      public String getDetailsLong()
      Returns a detailed description of the flight including passenger list.
      Returns:
      a string containing all flight details and passenger information
